name: rechannel
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to direct something into a particular place or situation that is new or different from a previous place or situation: We provide a space for young people where we try to rechannel their energies into creative art and music projects. Last year, I vowed to re-channel my grocery money away from big processed food companies.
